attributes.action: Compensate anyone who has had benefits withheld result in losing their home lots
attributes.additional_details: £100,000 plus £10,000 per month until the very same council that withheld their benefits rehomes them in a similar home in the same location should be paid for anyone who has had their benefits witheld for 3 months or longer and resulted in an eviction where the noted reason is non payment of rent.  Especially when every effort has been made to get benefits paid and to be rehomed by the council and ignored of fobbed off by them constantly causing further distress and damages.
attributes.background: Having had my housing benefits witheld 9 months leading to losing my home and it being all over the news about similar stories, the government should pay those affected due compensation for loss of home, possessions and distress caused for length of term without permanent similar home in location
